TopicTitle: A very special gift from Shapeways! (Ended)

Articles.Content: I'm in! GL everyone! ![^_^](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_happy.png)
I can't believe I actually felt compelled to mathematically confirm my answer to both questions.
Will be difficult to decide ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)
Good luck everyone ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif) new aerodynamics is going to be amazing
Very cool, entered!
Wish ya all the best of luck, is there anything better than a 3D printet Kerbal whatching you play KSP 1.0 !?!?!?! NO there isn't!
Don't know if I were in time, but entered anyway, Good Luck everyone! ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
I know i got it right... but there's still that shred of doubt!
I'm worried I got the second question wrong.

Question: Has anyone seen / previously inquired if Squad gets a portion of the proceeds from these purchases? I'm not asking for percentages or anything like that ... but if I'm going to purchase KSP merchandise, I'd certainly be more comfortable knowing that doing so not only supports the merchant, but Squad as well.

I Ass(u)me so ... but I'd just like confirmation.

~M~
Have I won yet?

> 
> Question: Has anyone seen / previously inquired if Squad gets a portion of the proceeds from these purchases? I'm not asking for percentages or anything like that ... but if I'm going to purchase KSP merchandise, I'd certainly be more comfortable knowing that doing so not only supports the merchant, but Squad as well.

As I understand it Squad does get a portion of the revenue for them, yes.
I almost don't want to enter. Someone else deserves it more than me.

> 
> I put under ground. Cause it said on the earth nothing about under it. I think I'm right not sure though.

I think you have to think higher then that, heh heh

There was only the question about the population, an another for your username, right?

I feel that I missed somesthing...
Just for reference, the remainder percentage of 7 billion is about 5.7

> 
> Just for reference, the remainder percentage of 7 billion is about 5.7

Rounding errors and lack of precision in that "7 billion" can change a person to 0.7 of a person. It's cruel, but maths is never friendly!
Just in time for 1.0! Perfect. Good Luck to you all!

Last minute entry; I just saw this. 

Gee, I hope I win ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
Val is interesting but are there any more female Kerbals now?
Does anyone know if Shapeways has a Kerbal Space Program parts list to build our own rockets?
Or better yet a Kerbal Space Academy type set with like Scott Manley and Das Valdez as Kerbals? lol
So when do we find out?

@Hairybucket, unfortunately no. What there IS, however, is a Papercraft Build-Your-Own-Rocket design someone on made. It is essentially Origami Rockets! Check out the thread [HERE](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/84621-Paper-Space-Program-%28-a-k-a-KSP-Rocket-Parts-Papercraft%29) if you would like to get some!
